content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day January 18, 2022 Email Warning Banners January 18, 2022 by Mike Fleck Many companies use email warning banners to alert their employees to potential phishing threats. However, the banners are often based on simplistic, generic rules and users quickly learn to ignore them.
